ExperienceSummary.Description: The candidate is experienced in:  Information Technology (Programming; Cloud Computing; Config Deploy Upgrade Migrate). The candidate appears to be an entry-level candidate, with 0 months of experience.

Positions.Description:
● Having 5.3+ years of professional IT experience as DevOps Engineer & Software
Configuration and Build Management Engineer, Linux Administrator, and Cloud Assistant
that includes Environment setup, Build automation, Continuing Integration, scripting and
deployments.
● Created EC2 instances in Amazon Web Services. Assigned Elastic IPs to the Instances.
● Have experience in creating the volumes in EC2 and attaching those volumes to
Instances.
● Have experience in taking backup of EBS volumes using Amazon EBS snapshots.
● Created an AMI from an existing instance to save the configuration & to use for other
instances.
● Created and mounted the File Systems (EFS) on AWS Linux Instance, S3 bucket.
● Worked on taking the ELB snapshots and restore in the same availability zone and for
other regions.
● Worked on taking complete Instance Backup and Restore.
● Knowing Route53, IAM Role & Policies, Lambda, Cloud Watch, and SNS.
● Knowing Terraform (Infrastructure as a code).
● Installed and configured Web server on Linux AWS Instances.
● Configured Load Balancer between different Instances.
● Worked on the creation of custom Docker container images, tagging and pushing the
images.
● Worked on creating the Docker containers and Docker consoles for managing the
application life cycle.
● Knowledge of creating multiple containers using shell script.
● Configuring the Docker containers and creating Docker files for different environments.
● Experience in Automating, building, deploying, and releasing code from one environment
to other environments.
● Having Experience in modifying the existing Python, and Bash scripts.
● Good hands-on experience in Build automation tools like Maven, and Npm.
● Have written lots of JENKINS PIPELINE scripts from scratch.
● Integrated Source Control Mechanism (clean up, checkout, update, commit, tagging, etc.)
with build systems using Ant and Shell scripting.
● Extensive experience in using MAVEN build tool for the building deployable artifacts (jar,
war & ear) from source code.
● Good knowledge of using SonarQube, Nexus Repos for Java, and Nodejs Project.
● Creating and maintaining the source code repositories using Git/GitHub.
● Worked on GitHub administration tasks like maintaining user base, access control,
backup, migrations, etc.
● Good Working experience on Git.
● Performed the tasks of Branching, Tagging & Merging the source code between multiple
branches.
● Configured Continuous Integration (CI) tools Jenkins/Hudson from scratch. Installed
Jenkins, created build jobs, set up distributed build systems, and Handle custom Plugins,
Administration, Backup, and Migration activities.
● Expertise in designing and developing Jenkins deployments.
● Good hands-on experience in creating Jenkins jobs, plugin installations, and setting up
distributed builds using the master/slave concept.
● Ability in managing all aspects of the software configuration management process
including code compilation, packaging/deployment/release methodology, and
application configuration.
● Experience in installing, configuring, managing, and tracing complex build problems,
release issues, and troubleshooting skills.
● Excellent experience in designing, documenting, and automating the build and release
process.
● Troubleshoot the build issue during the Jenkins build process.
● Good knowledge in planning and updating development, QA, and staging environments
with different codebases, based on requirements.
● Good knowledge in Analysing bugs, and interacting with development and QA teams to
fix the defects and build failures.
● Good hands-on experience with Tomcat application servers and deployments.
● Good experience in SHELL scripting.
● Accelerate application delivery with greater productivity and reliability.
● Good Hands-on experience with Unix/Linux.
● Coordinate with development and QA teams to deliver hotfixes to production in time.
● Good knowledge in planning and updating development, QA, and staging environments
with different codebases, based on requirements.
● Excellent communicative, interpersonal, intuitive, and analysis skills with the ability to
work efficiently in both independent and teamwork environments.
● Having Good oral/written Communication Skills.


Roles & Responsibilities

●   Analysis, planning, and solution design.
●   Development.
●   Coding, integration, and testing.
●   Client communication.

Findings.Message: We found no valid start and end dates for the jobs in your work history. Each job must have a start date and an end date, preferably at the start of the line, and written as MONTH YYYY - MONTH YYYY. Never use dates that include the 'day' part.
You should not use the PDF format for your resume. Due to inherent limitations with text extraction from PDFs, you are less likely to get a job when using a PDF resume.
A first and last name was not found in the contact information. A resume should always include the candidate's first and last name.
These sections are longer than the work history and education sections combined. This may indicate a problem with section headers, formatting, or content.
A street level address was not found in the contact information. A full contact address should always be included in a resume as it allows for location based searches.
Every position in a resume should have a job title.
Every position in a resume should have an employer name.
Every position in a resume should have a start date.
Every position in a resume should have an end date, unless it is a currently held position.
We found no work history positions within the past year. A resume should include work history information, including time off, for the most recent year.

The following section was identified as a skills section type: 'Technical Skills'. Skills should not be in a separate section, but instead, each skill should be included in the descriptions of work history or education. THIS IS INCREDIBLY IMPORTANT FOR AI MATCHING ALGORITHMS

About Capital Numbers


600+	237+	Certifications	100+ Five Star
Number of Employees	Clients Worldwide	ISO 9001:2008, ISO	Reviews
On Clutch, Google, and
27001:2013
GoodFirms


Capital Numbers is an ISO 9001 and ISO 27001 certified digital solutions company with 600+
experts working full-time across 3 Delivery Centres. Established in 2012, Capital Numbers are
headquartered in Kolkata, India, with offices in the USA, Sweden, and Australia. We are winners of
multiple awards and accolades from organizations like CII, Clutch, GoodFirms, Deloitte, Financial
Times, Economic Times, and the Bengal Chamber of Commerce.

Our innovative "In-Demand Skills, On-Demand" allows businesses to ramp up their team for Web,
Mobile, DevOps, AI/ML, or UI/UX Development needs. We serve companies ranging from start-ups
and SMEs to global brands from all across the world.

Our industry expertise includes digital publishing, SaaS applications, online retail, financial
services, travel and consumer, software and hi-tech, business information and media, life sciences
and healthcare, as well as other emerging industries. Our primary aim is to provide our clients with
quality services, customer-specific technologies, and comprehensive expertise.
